name: Super Marble Bubble
description:
In Super Marble Bubble, you're going to explore and unearth the legendary pyramids. Free to experience a epic adventure!

How to play:
- Touch the screen where you want to shoot.
- Match 3 or more same marble candies to eliminate them.
- Swap the shooting ball will make it more easier.
- Make more Combos and Chains to get the higher score.

Features:
- Bombs, power, and other interesting props are available.
- Two game mode (adventure/challenge) make it more challenge.
- Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & effects!
- Easy to learn and hard to master.
